title.rendered: Karachi Police Department Job In August 2024

content.rendered:
Karachi Police Department Job In August 2024. There are several positions available in the Police Department in Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan, for which applications are being accepted. Karachi’s police department is responsible for ensuring the safety and well-being of its citizens.

This document is for informational purposes only and does not constitute an employment offer. Any application received by the Police Department may be accepted or declined.

Individuals interested in applying should send their applications along with attested copies of relevant documents to the following address. It starts at 15000 rupees and goes up to 30000 rupees per month as a minimum salary.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads on Statesaga.com

Latest Police Department Karachi Job 2024

Date Posted: 17 Aug, 2024
Last Date: 25 Oct, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Kawish Jobs
Education: Matric
Location: Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan
Organization: Police Department
Job Industry: Management Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement

On 17 August 2024, the Kawish Newspaper published a job advertisement regarding the vacant constable position at the Karachi Police Department. Candidates with an educational background are preferred.

In a newspaper ad stating the closing date, the Police Department will accept applications for its latest Government Management jobs and other jobs until oct 25, 2024. Please read the complete job ad online for more information about how to apply for the latest police department jobs.

How to Apply for an Internship at KPT

Learn how to apply for internships at KPT, from submission requirements to selection procedures. Make your resume and cover letter stand out by showcasing your skills and passion for maritime jobs.
